name: COPY Space program
description:
This time I wanted to do a simple game controlled by a mouse only. It is almost a management type game, but it is more about the strategy.

The goal is to beat the enemy. The game starts once you buy your first scientist.

The scientist adds money and little progress, Guards adds protection against enemy spies and Spies are adding extra progress if not caught by an enemy guard, but they don't create money.
